thread.title: SPX to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 4th
thread.title_full: SPX to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 4th

author: admin
title: SPX to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 4th
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 1:45 PM Companies mentioned in this article: SPX Corporation 
CHARLOTTE, N.C., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SPX Corporation announced today that it will release its third quarter 2015 financial results on Wednesday, November 4, 2015. 
SPX Corporation President and Chief Executive Officer Gene Lowe and SPX Corporation Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer Scott Sproule will discuss the company's third quarter results during a conference call at 4:30 p.m. Eastern time. Those interested in participating in the conference call should dial in five minutes prior to the start of the call. The call will be simultaneously webcast via the company's website at www.spx.com and the slide presentation will be available in the Investor Relations section of the site. 
Conference call From outside the United States: +1 541-797-2429 Participant code: 63812799 
A replay of the call will be available by telephone through Wednesday, November 11(th). 
To listen to a replay of the call Dial in: 855-859-2056 From outside the United States: +1 404-537-3406 Participant code: 63812799 
About SPX Corporation 
Based in Charlotte, North Carolina, SPX Corporation is a leading supplier of highly engineered HVAC products, detection and measurement technologies and power equipment. With operations in 20 countries, SPX Corporation has approximately $2 billion in annual revenues and approximately 6,000 employees worldwide. SPX Corporation is listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol "SPXC". For more information, please visit www.spx.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/spx-to-report-third-quarter-2015-financial-results-on-november-4th-300162205.html 
SOURCE SPX Corporation
